content.raw:
I thought I could get the linting going by typing:


```
npm eslint

```
But instead I have to type


```
npm run-script eslint
```

http://stackoverflow.com/questions/23547061/npm-package-json-scripts-not-being-called

Maybe we can put it as "prepublish" instead of  "eslint"?
npm-gulp is probably too much at this point.

fyi, here's an interesting article about npm vs gulp / grunt

https://medium.freecodecamp.com/why-i-left-gulp-and-grunt-for-npm-scripts-3d6853dd22b8#.t7ly8mput
